email_share_body: Check out Elusive Origin - an immersive cultural investigation platform

testimonials.quote: #Buglary30 was so fun! It's exactly the type of event I like to attend these days. I love celebrating birthdays AND participating in a little mystery and drama!
testimonials.name: Candice Johnson

faq_items.question: What makes Elusive different?
faq_items.answer: We create authentic cultural experiences that celebrate heritage through interactive storytelling, not just entertainment or aesthetics.

faq_items.question: When does the first event launch?
faq_items.answer: Our inaugural investigation event is scheduled for **August 2025** but could take place as late as **Fall 2025**. Early access begins shortly before the official launch.

faq_items.question: What is the Vessel app?
faq_items.answer: Vessel is our companion mobile app that will serve as your investigation toolkit - featuring clue tracking, character rosters, and community discussions.

hero_description: Imagine a world where mysteries don’t just entertain but also spark conversations about identity and truth. Elusive combines live events, serialized microfilms, and interactive storytelling to create premium, multi-city experiences where your decisions and theories help uncover deeper narratives.
twitter_share_text: The Investigation Begins - Join the Elusive Origin community
rsvp_progress_text: Join the investigation when we reach our goal

why_join_features.title: Authentic Cultural Experiences
why_join_features.description: Participate in carefully crafted culturally-resonant investigations that celebrate heritage and storytelling.

why_join_features.title: Community Connection
why_join_features.description: Connect with fellow truth-seekers and creators in a space designed for meaningful engagement.

why_join_features.title: Early Access
why_join_features.description: Get exclusive access to events, tools, and community features before they're public.

signup_section_description: Be the first to know when the investigation begins.
signup_form_footer_text: No spam, just mysteries. Unsubscribe at any time.
